rules:
Server Rules

Just follow these rules you will be a star :3
Have Fun and enjoy yourself and be yourself.
Being racist or making fun of people will get you ban. We are open community.
Please keep NSFW in in NSFW.
Look out for people in this server please.
Please listen to the mods and host of the server please and thanks.
Try to party and tell people about this server if you enjoy it
We try to party every Saturday night in the club or just hanging out.
Be respectful, civil, and welcoming.
Do not misuse or spam in any of the channels.
Do not join the server to promote your content.
Remain on topic and use channels correctly.
Do not share personal information.
Good luck with all don’t forget to party and have fun.
infoBoard:
Welcome to Little Drinking Group!
Almost 8 years of chaos, chill nights, holiday parties, and big VRChat hangouts & you’re now part of it.

Jump in, vibe hard, bring your energy, bring your friends,
and let’s make more wild memories together.
Have fun… and we’ll see you around!
